segments.text: This kitchen scene is making my heart race just looking at it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is drying dishes, but the faucet is still running full blast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's spilling over the sink edge, soaking the cabinets and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing right there, unaware, with her foot in the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If she slips, it could be really bad.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, look at those kids on the other side.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on that shaky stool, stretching up to the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he'll tumble right down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate and grabbing from the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is right beside him, arm raised, expecting a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're so focused on the mischief, they don't see the danger either.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a calm garden, but inside it's a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone turns off that water soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
